page.title: 20Woodsetts Junior School
page.content: This{information}has been compiled by class 6 in{Woodsetts Junior School. Class 6 has thirty three nine and ten year old boys and girls who live in {Woodsetts,Firbeck and Letwell.}The children from Firbeck and Letwell come to school every day on the school bus which is free.19 children have{school {dinners}which costs 55p a day.13 children bring their own sandwiches and one person goes home for dinner every day.The Junior School building is eleven years old and has five classes.There are 152 children attending.
